thread.title: Congo health minister says Ebola outbreak in "new phase" after urban case

title: Congo health minister says Ebola outbreak in "new phase" after urban case
text:
May 16, 2018 / 11:44 PM / Updated an hour ago Congo health minister says Ebola outbreak in 'new phase' after urban case Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
KINSHASA (Reuters) - Congo Health Minister Oly Ilunga Kalenga late on Wednesday said in a statement that the country’s Ebola outbreak had entered “a new phase” after a case of the virus was detected in the northwest city of Mbandaka, with a population of about 1 million people.
The World Health Organization, which is deploying vaccines in the Democratic Republic of Congo, had expressed concern about the disease reaching Mbandaka, which would make the outbreak, already believed to have killed 23 people, far harder to tackle. Reporting by Fiston Mahamba; Writing by Edward McAllister; Editing by Sandra Maler
